headerDisplay: Homebridge plugin for NoLongerEvil Nest thermostats. Works with both the hosted service and self-hosted installations.

apiKey.title: API Key
apiKey.description: Your NoLongerEvil API key. Create one in Settings > API Keys with 'read' and 'write' scopes.

serverUrl.title: Server URL (Optional)
serverUrl.description: Only set this if using a self-hosted NoLongerEvil server. Leave empty to use the hosted service (nolongerevil.com).

pollInterval.title: Poll Interval (seconds)
pollInterval.description: How often to poll the thermostat for status updates. Minimum 15 seconds due to API rate limits.
